column2: Question
Do you approve or disapprove of the way Nathan Deal is handling his job as governor?
Do you approve or disapprove of the way Johnny Isakson is handling his job in the U.S. Senate?
Do you approve or disapprove of the way the Georgia legislature is doing its job?
How satisfied are you with the way things are going in Georgia today?
Would you describe the state of Georgia's economy these days?
What is the single most important issue facing Georgia today?

Lawmakers are considering a religious liberty bill that supporters say will prevent state and local governments from interfering with an individual's right to  practice their religion. Supporters say the bill would protect people of any religion from government interference. Opponents worry it could lead to discrimination against gays and lesbians. Do you think the Georgia legislature should approve this religious liberty bill, or not?

What if the bill allowed businesses here in Georgia to refuse service or refuse to offer a job to gays or lesbians based on the business owner's religious beliefs?  Would you still approve of the religious liberty bill, or would you oppose it?
Do you favor or oppose allowing casino gambling in Georgia?

Lawmakers are considering merit-based pay for public school teachers, that is legislation that would tie public school teachers’ pay and raises to student performance. Critics of the bill say this would be unfair, because teachers can’t control who their students are. Supporters of the bill say that it would improve the quality of teaching by rewarding effective teaching. Do you favor or oppose merit-based pay for public school teachers?
Do you think the state's medical marijuana law should be expanded to allow the harvesting and distribution of medical marijuana with strict controls within the state, or not?
In the last year, do you think race relations in the United States have improved, grown worse or stayed about the same?
Would you like the next president to be someone who has experience in how the political system works, or someone from outside the existing political establishment?

column3: Someone from outside the existing establishment

column2: What is the single most important issue in your choice for president: the economy, health care, immigration issues, tax policy or the threat of terrorism?

Do you have a favorable or unfavorable impression of the Democratic Party?
